Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Landing Gear component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 20/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
